description: Display of an internally illuminated fascia sign measuring 0.7m in height and 2.2m in width and an internally illuminated projecting sign measuring 0.5m in height and 0.8m in width.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The maximum steady brightness of the fascia sign hereby permitted is not to exceed 400 candelas per sq.m.
Reason: To ensure the sign does not have an adverse effect on the amenity of the area in accordance with Council policy LP9 of the Local Plan and to comply with paragraph 132 of the National Planning Policy Framework.

Condition : 2 - The maximum steady brightness of the projecting sign hereby permitted is not to exceed 400 candelas per sq.m. 
Reason: To ensure the proposed sign does not have an adverse effect on the amenity of the area in accordance with Council policy LP9 of the Local Plan and to comply with paragraph 132 of the National Planning Policy Framework.

Condition : 3 - The illumination of the sign(s) hereby permitted shall be by static illumination only. 
Reason: In the interest of highway safety and of the visual amenities of the locality in accordance with Council policy LP9 of the Local Plan and to comply with paragraph 132 of the National Planning Policy Framework.
